title: Shore Bird Restaurant and Beach Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Buffet, Salad bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All-you-can-eat gourmet lunch and dinner salad bar. Dinner bar is mostly vegetarian and starts from 4:30pm, cost is around $14. Drinks and smoothies menu available. Try their delicious and refreshing non-alcoholic "Hula Hula". Set directly on Waikiki Beach where you can watch the sunset.
